12.title: Mahadev
12.description: He is the supreme being and the destroyer of evil. Witness lord Shiva's story, his avatars, and a union that shaped the universe - his marriage to Parvati.

435.title: Mahabharat
435.description: The mother of all wars, the epitome of all rivalries, the cauldron of emotions, insecurities, jealousies, and power play - Mahabharat!

1877.title: Mahabharatham
1877.description: The legendary rivalry of the Pandavas and Kauravas culminates in Kurukshetra as this epic war, driven by the sharp strategies of Krishna, the master puppeteer.

4122.title: Mahabharatham
4122.description: Watch the rivalry of the Pandavas and Kauravas culminate in the Kurukshetra war in Mahabharatham, driven by the razor-sharp strategies of Krishna, the master puppeteer.

6363.title: Siya Ke Ram
6363.description: A classic epic Ramayana, the story of Ram and Sita, retold through the eyes of the righteous, beautiful and brave Sita.

10554.title: Krishnotsav
10554.description: Mischievous, witty and enigmatic. The story of Lord Krishna, from his birth to becoming Arjun's saarthi in Mahabharata.

11147.title: Ramleela
11147.description: Narrated by Ajay Devgn, an epic retelling of the grandest war between the noble king Rama and Ravana as a musical.

15439.title: Vithu Mauli
15439.description: A devotional story of Lord Vitthal and his devotee Pundalik, who is credited for bringing Maharashtra's most beloved deity, Lord Vitthal to Pandharpur.

18341.title: Divya Ravivaar
18341.description: Soak in the valuable pearls of wisdom from the epic war between the hundred Kauravas and five Pandavas by revisiting the magnificent tale of Bharata dynasty.

1260000646.title: RadhaKrishn
1260000646.description: Radha and Krishna are the epitome of eternal love and sacrifice, transcending eras and emotions. Here's a never-seen-before retelling of this supreme romance.

1260001263.title: Karn Sangini
1260001263.description: Based on the book 'Karna's Wife: The Outcast's Queen', this story is about princess Uruvi's bravery, shattering class barriers, and her immense love for Karn.

1260002518.title: Radha Krishna
1260002518.description: The story of Radha and Krishna is the epitome of eternal love, which transcends eras and emotions. Here's a never-seen-before retelling of the supreme romance.

1260003097.title: RadhaKrishna
1260003097.description: Radha's love for Lord Krishna knows no bounds. Their eternal love has stood the test of time. Here's a soulful re-telling of this supreme tale of romance and sacrifice.

1260010974.title: Namah Laxmi Narayan
1260010974.description: He is the supreme lord and the ultimate soul of the universe. The creator, the preserver and the annihilator. Watch legends of Lord Narayan and his avatars.

1260011373.title: Maa Vaishnodevi
1260011373.description: A riveting story of Goddess Vaishno Devi, an amalgamation of supreme powers to fight every battle against evil and save the mankind.

1260026469.title: Radha Krishna
1260026469.description: Radha and Krishna's story is the epitome of eternal love, which transcends eras and emotions. Watch the epic retelling of this supreme romance.

1260052109.title: The Legend of Hanuman
1260052109.description: Hanuman has realised his limitless powers, and now he must journey alone to Lanka to face the might of the demon king Ravan, his fierce sons and his armies.

1260071152.title: Bolo Ambe Maa Ki Jai
1260071152.description: Narrated by Saptarishi, celebrate Navratri with these auspicious stories about the nine avatars of Goddess Durga.

1260071767.title: Jai Kanhaiya Lal Ki
1260071767.description: To teach the world that good always prevails over evil, Lord Vishnu takes birth as Krishna. Watch the tales and miracles from his childhood.
